Shall: All serviceable joints shall be metal gasket face-seal (/FS
Class: VCR-compatible) with no PTFE/elastomer in wetted helium service

Shall: Each /FS remake shall use a new metal gasket with batch trace and tamper scan
Panel interfaces shall be female and mobile modules male; deviations logged
Small solenoid pilots shall be fail-open so instrument-air loss does not obstruct manual isolation flow
Leak acceptance shall meet Addendum Table 6 under ambient and standby conditions
Verification: Helium MS leak test per EN 13185 / ISO 20485

Shall: DBB plus eductor purge shall achieve residual air ≤0.05% before breaking /FS joints
QINFRA.S and QRB.S shall be protected at 1.3 bar(a) with PSV capacity ≥200 g/s helium at 300 K discharged to WCS.LP
Verification: Certified sizing calculation and PSV certificate

Shall: Provide BD and PSV populations/setpoints as specified (BD 65; PSV 210) with certification of capacity
Implement tamper-evident ties across /FS nuts with scan-based remake counting
